materials: Brush; Christmas Trees; Grass Clippings; Leaves; Tree Trimmings; Weeds; Yard Waste
notes: This site reopens on December 26 for a few weeks for Christmas tree drop-off.  This site is located at the Clark Street Salt Shed.  Home compost bins are available for purchase at DPW at 20 East Worcester Street.  Please bundle hedge prunings, shrub prunings, garden waste, and small brush into lengths not exceeding three feet.
